item.title: Kasabian - Club Foot
item.description:
One take
control of me
Yer messing
with the enemy
Said it’s 2
it’s another trick
Messin with my mind
I wake up
Chase down
an empty street
Blindly snap
the broken beats
Said it’s cut
with a dirty trick
It’s taken all these
days to find ya
Ah I tell you
I want you
Ah I’ll tell you
I need you
Friends take
control of me
Stalking cross’
the gallery
All these pills
got to operate
The colour quits
and all invade us
There he
goes again
Take me
to the edge again
All I got
is a dirty trick
I’m chasin down
the wolves to save ya
Ah I tell you
I want you
Ah I’ll tell you
I need you
Ah the blood aint
on my face
Ah just wanted you
near me

Ah I tell you
I want you
Ah I’ll tell you
I need you
Ah the blood aint
on my hands
Ah just wanted you
near me

Ah tell you
I want you
Ah I’ll tell you
I need you
Ah blood aint
on my hands
Ah just wanted you
near me
